messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] business/family cards, was looking for work
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9-8-2003 10:36:41 AM Mountain Daylight Time, SandraDodd@aol.com writes: Holly wanted business cards of her own, and Kirby hands mine out
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9-8-2003 10:36:41 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:
Holly wanted business cards of her own, and Kirby hands mine out with his
e-mail address written on the back, but we should just make some joint SCHOOL
cards, with all of us listed.
*****************************************************
We even have titles for each of us <g> I, of course, am the Queen of
Everything, Hannah is the Princess of Quite a Lot, and Hayden is the Prince of
Whatever's Left.
Hannah's turned into a social butterfly :) and likes to hand them out to her
friends, too.

diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...
"You can follow your book and your map of wars, but I'll go and follow my
kids." -- Woody Guthrie


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
